resources.string: An appume is simply a resume reimagined as a mobile app. It is an innovative way for me to showcase my skills and experience in an effort to land me a job as a mobile developer.

I am a software engineer with eight years development experience supporting military, governmental and commercial programs including the design, development, and integration of computer software programs. A graduate of the Udacity Android Developer nanodegree program, I am looking to pivot into the mobile development space as either an Android or iOS developer or both as I have published apps to the Play Store and the App Store.

string-array.name: certifications
string-array.item: Oracle Certified Associate, Java SE 7 Programmmer

string-array.name: skills
string-array.item: Programming Languages: Java, JavaScript, Kotlin, PHP, Swift, C++, HTML, SQL, XML
Integrated Development Environments: Eclipse, NetBeans, Android Studio, Xcode
Frameworks: JQuery, JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), Java Server Pages (JSP), Hibernate, Java Server Pages Standard Tag Libraries (JSTL), Spring MVC
Version Control: GitHub, Subversion, Atlassian, CVS

string-array.name: education
string-array.item: M. S. Computer Science\nNorfolk State University\n2010
B. S. Computer Science\nEast Tennessee State University\n2000

string-array.name: android_project_details
string-array.item: {\"name\":{\"app_name\":\"GoodForce Demo\",\"github_android_link\":\"http://www.github.com/dburgnerjr/Capstone-Project\", \"play_store_link\":\"\",\"github_ios_link\":\"\",\"app_store_link\":\"\",\"app_description\":[\"* Demo version of GoodForce app which will be a trivia game designed to help others pay down credit card debt, car loans, payday and personal loans.\", \"* Provides user with a trivia game that will allow the user to answer questions in an effort to gain extra lives (full version would allow the user to win money towards their debt).\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"app_name\":\"Popular Movies\",\"github_android_link\":\"http://www.github.com/dburgnerjr/PopularMoviesGoogleUdacity\", \"play_store_link\":\"\",\"github_ios_link\":\"\",\"app_store_link\":\"\",\"app_description\":[\"* Presents the user with a grid arrangement of movie posters upon launch, sorted by popularity and by user rating.\",\"* Presents the user with detailed information, to include backdrop, user rating, title, overview, release date, trailers and reviews.\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"app_name\":\"TSA Randomizer\",\"github_android_link\":\"http://www.github.com/dburgnerjr/TSALeftOrRightFree\", \"play_store_link\":\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.danielburgnerjr.tsaleftorrightfree\",\"github_ios_link\": \"http://www.github.com/dburgnerjr/TSARandomizerIOS\",\"app_store_link\":\"\",\"app_description\":[\"* Allows the user to select a button that will display a left arrow or right arrow at random based on the app used by the TSA.\",\"* Allows the user to remove ads/restore purchases (iOS only) along with the ability to share the app with other users.\",\"* Completed Android version in two days.\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"app_name\":\"Flipulator\",\"github_android_link\":\"http://www.github.com/dburgnerjr/FlipulatorFree\", \"play_store_link\":\"https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.danielburgnerjr.flipulatorfree\",\"github_ios_link\": \"https://github.com/dburgnerjr/FlipulatorIOS\",\"app_store_link\":\"\",\"app_description\":[\"* Created a real estate investment calculator designed to evaluate the viability of rehabbing a house to determine profitability for the real estate investor.\", \"* This app displays results of whether or not a property is profitable by showing the profit, ROI, and cash on cash return and can be sent to fellow investors and realtors in Excel spreadsheet format.\"]}}

string-array.name: experience_details
string-array.item: {\"name\":{\"position\":\"Java Developer\",\"location\":\"San Antonio, TX\",\"company\": \"Principle InfoTech\nFrankie Friend and Associates\",\"time_period\":\"November 2018 to Present\nOctober 2017 to October 2018\",\"position_description\":[\"* Develop modules for an application used by the US Air Force to help over 38,000 civilian and military police officers perform their duties. \",\"* Transforming the application to use the SpringMVC framework and support the latest version of Java.\",\"* Creating front-end validation methods using JavaScript in an effort to transmit information to Spring MVC controller to facilitate storage in the database.\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Java, Java Server Pages (JSP), Eclipse, Apache Tomcat, JavaScript, JSON, JSP Tag Libraries (JSTL), AJAX, HTML, CSS, SQL, Oracle Weblogic, Spring MVC\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Java Developer\",\"location\":\"San Antonio, TX\",\"company\":\"Kforce\", \"time_period\":\"August 2017 to October 2017\",\"position_description\":[\"* Developed modules for a web application used by a financial services company that serves over 12 million customers.\",\"* Implemented code change that filters out all inactive products that customers have.\",\"* Verified product information was visible on test servers before they migrated to production\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Java, Eclipse, JUnit, Apache Tomcat\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Software Systems Engineer\",\"location\":\"Chesapeake, VA\",\"company\": \"Xcelerate Solutions\",\"time_period\":\"April 2016 to May 2017\",\"position_description\": [\"* Developed modules for management information system application used in development, execution and management of purchasing of supplies for the Department of Defense.\",\"* Resolved over 1900 issues in source code resulting from initial code review.\",\"* Responded to trouble calls regarding site connectivity.\",\"* Skills/ Technologies Used: Java, Eclipse, Apache Tomcat\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Software Engineer\",\"location\":\"Norfolk, VA\",\"company\":\"Dominion Enterprises\", \"time_period\":\"October 2014 to November 2015\",\"position_description\":[\"* Collaborated with the engineering team to develop the infrastructure that supports exciting new products across multiple platforms and devices.\", \"* Contributed to the continued development and maintenance of multiple high-traffic, high availability web sites, mobile sites, and mobile applications.\",\"* Contributed to systems and applications which process, transform and generate data from and for many partners on a daily basis.\",\"* Mentored a team of college students that developed a mobile app during a company-sponsored hackathon, resulting in the team winning the Most Innovative App award.\", \"* Skills/Technologies Used: PHP, SQL, JavaScript, JQuery, JSON, Linux, Apache Tomcat, MySQL, GitHub, Zend, MongoDB, Lucene Solr, Oracle, NetBeans, Eclipse\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Programmer\",\"location\":\"Portsmouth, VA\",\"company\":\"CDI Marine Company\", \"time_period\":\"March 2014 to October 2014\",\"position_description\":[\"* Developed modules for management information system application used in development, execution and management of purchasing of supplies within the department.\",\"* Implemented and modified designs of interfaces based on requirements provided using Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications as the development layer and Microsoft Access database to store the data provided by the users that involved the design or redesign of tables and SQL queries.\",\"* Provided technical support to end users regarding system issues resulting in reduced downtime.\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Microsoft Access, Visual Basic for Applications, SQL\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Software Engineer\",\"location\":\"Suffolk, VA\",\"company\":\"SAIC\",\"time_period\": \"July 2012 to August 2013\",\"position_description\":[\"* Developed modules for financial and management information system application used in the development, execution, and management of a $140M+ joint training budget for the Department of Defense.\",\"* Utilized Excel templates to generate reports using Windward Reports as part of a migration to a web application.\",\"* Implemented designs of interfaces based on requirements provided using Java for the web presentation layer, Hibernate for the mapping files and Oracle database to store the data provided by the users that involved the design of tables and SQL queries constructed from the desktop application.\",\"* Provided technical support to end users regarding system issues resulting in reduced downtime.\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Java, Java Server Pages, Eclipse, SQL, Oracle, Hibernate, J2EE, Apache Tomcat, Windward Reports, JavaScript\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Software Engineer I\",\"location\":\"Suffolk, VA\",\"company\":\"Truestone\",\"time_period\": \"October 2011 to June 2012\",\"position_description\":[\"* Participated in software requirement, preliminary and critical design, integration readiness and software acceptance reviews.\",\"* Developed interfaces using Java Web Services, Java Application Server, J2EE and Java Message Service with a focus on Service Oriented Architecture.\",\"* Updated and enhanced existing interfaces and system services to provide greater usability and productivity of supported applications.\", \"* Provided subject matter expertise and engineering support to functional development personnel.\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Java, Java Server Pages, NetBeans, SQL, MySQL, J2EE, Apache Tomcat, JavaScript, ActiveMQ, JBoss, Glassfish, Java Web Services, Service Oriented Architecture\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Patent Examiner\",\"location\":\"Alexandria, VA\",\"company\":\"USPTO\",\"time_period\": \"January 2011 to September 2011\",\"position_description\":[\"* Reviewed patent applications to determine compliance with Federal law.\",\"* Researched relevant technologies to apply references to the claimed invention.\",\"* Communicated findings and decisions to patent practitioners and/or inventors\"]}}

{\"name\":{\"position\":\"Laboratory Assistant\",\"location\":\"Norfolk, VA\",\"company\":\"Norfolk State University\", \"time_period\":\"January 2010 to August 2010\",\"position_description\":[\"* Developed Java desktop application that allowed an user to read an XML electronic medical record.\",\"* Authored three papers that were published in three separate journals.\",\"* Presented two papers on behalf of one professor and five undergraduate students at a conference in Las Vegas, NV.\",\"* Assisted faculty in research and tutoring.\",\"* Skills/Technologies Used: Java, XML, PGP, XML Digital Signature\"]}}

string-array.name: recommendation_details
string-array.item: {\"name\":{\"manager\":\"Reno McCormick\",\"recommendationText\":\"Daniel and I worked on a Java-based web application for about a year. In that time I found his depth of knowledge and willingness to go the extra mile to be of extreme importance to the success of our project. Daniel identified and corrected several hundred deprecated Java classes, and helped to improve the performance of the web application. He was a valued employee, and I enjoyed working with Daniel.\"}}

{"name":{"manager":"David Dennis","recommendationText":"I highly recommend Daniel Burgner for employment. Daniel was employed by Xcelerate Solutions as a Java developer/systems engineer from 2016 to 2017. Daniel was responsible for sustainment support for a classified system, including system administration, troubleshooting, patching, updating and enhancements utilizing JAVA and Oracle tools.
Daniel has been an excellent employee. In addition, he is extremely organized, reliable and modern technology literate. Daniel can work independently and is able to follow through to ensure that the job gets done. He is flexible and willing to work on any project that is assigned to him.
Daniel would be a tremendous asset for any company and has my highest recommendation. If you have any further questions with regard to his background or qualifications, please do not hesitate to contact me.
 Sincerely,
Dave Dennis
Vice President
Xcelerate Solutions"}}

{\"name\":{\"manager\":\"Frank M. Bird\",\"recommendationText\":\"Daniel is a very skilled developer. He was brought in to help maintain/upgrade a system written by other programmers. The system code was complex and difficult to follow. He quickly learned the system logic and was able to make meaningful contributions. I would recommend him without reservation.\"}}

{\"name\":{\"manager\":\"Lee Ash\",\"recommendationText\":\"Daniel has worked with me to resolve program issues quickly and efficiently. He has learned the database and has been very helpful in resolving issues as they arise.\"}}
